alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 10:41AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lafayette and southern Iowa Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1039 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mineral Point, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Brief heavy rain is also likely. Locations impacted include... Dodgeville, Mineral Point, Darlington, Shullsburg, Belmont, Benton, Wiota, Highland, Linden, Waldwick, Elk Grove, Cobb, Fayette, Lamont, Rewey, Hollandale, Gratiot, Calamine, Yellowstone Lake St Park and Blackhawk Lake Rec Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
